timeline.bodyText:
Maybe worth a comment here to explain that the two exposed ports are (a) the standard redis port 6379 and (b) one of the newly added ports 8987
I was quite confused why 2 would be the expected result until I realised about (a)!
timeline.author: rnorth

replies.bodyText: Okay :) FYI I just copied the other test, can add it there as well
replies.author: bsideup

replies.bodyText:

        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    assertThat("Both ports should be exposed", redis.getExposedPorts().size(), equalTo(2));
          
          
            
                    assertThat("Both ports should be exposed", redis.getExposedPorts().size(), equalTo(2)); // 2 ports = de-duplicated port 8897 and original port 6379
replies.author: rnorth
